CustomField.description: This formula field returns ‘Free’ if Paid__c = false, ‘Paid’ if Paid__c = false or blank if the recordType name is Service or Content, used on my favorites page.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This formula field returns ‘Free’ if Paid__c = false, ‘Paid’ if Paid__c = false or blank if the recordType name is Service or Content, used on my favorites page.
CustomField.label: PaidText
